text: Pacasmayo is an airport serving the Pacific coastal town of Pacasmayo in the La Libertad Region of Peru. The runway is just south of the town and inland from the shore. ==See also== * * *Transport in Peru *List of airports in Peru ==References== ==External links== *OpenStreetMap - Pacasmayo *OurAirports - Pacasmayo *SkyVector - Pacasmayo * Category:Airports in Peru Category:Buildings and structures in La Libertad Region
title: Pacasmayo Airport
